headline: Charter (CHTR) Target Raised by UBS Despite Broadband Growth Concerns
summary: Charter Communications, Inc. (NASDAQ:CHTR) ranks among the best forever stocks to invest in. John Hodulik, a UBS analyst, maintained a Neutral rating on Charter Communications, Inc. (NASDAQ:CHTR) on June 18 while raising the stock’s price target from $400 to $425. According to the analyst, the company expects seasonality, ramping fiber development, and ongoing competition from […]
